pageProduct.name: Swisse Hair Nutrition For Women 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Hair Nutrition For Women maintains healthy hair growth and supports hair strength from within for healthy, lush hair.

Premium Quality Formula based on Scientific evidence. 

Swisse Ultiboost Hair Nutrition for Women is a premium quality beauty formula to help support hair growth and strength from within for healthy, lush hair.

Healthy Hair Growth: Biotin helps support healthy hair growth by influencing cellular growth and development. Silica assists the formation of connective tissue and acts as the building blocks for healthy hair.

Hair Strength: Dry, brittle hair may result from dietary iron requirements not being met. Iron helps maintain healthy, strong hair.

Beautiful, Lush Hair: Biotin assists the body with metabolism of protein. Dietary protein broken down into amino acids are needed for keratin formation. Keratin influences hair's structural integrity for healthy, luxuriant hair.

Size: 50 Tablets

Warnings

When taken in excess of 3000 mcg/RE, vitamin A can cause birth defects. If you are pregnant, or considering becoming pregnant, do not take vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor or pharmacist.

Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

This product contains selenium which is toxic in high doses. A daily dose of 150 mcg for adults of selenium from dietary supplements should not be exceeded. Do not use if cap seal is broken.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

No added lactose, gluten, yeast, egg or artificial flavours.

Swisse is a carbon neutral company.

Ingredients

Each Capsule contains:
Vitex (Vitex agnus-castus extract 1 mg) equiv. dry fruit 100 mg; Grape seed (Vitis vinifera extract 100 mg) equiv. dry seed (standardised to contain procyanidins 80 mg) 12 g; Vitamin A (retinol acetate) 112.50 mcg/RE; Vitamin B5 (pantothenic acid from calcium pantothenate) 10 mg; Vitamin B12 (cyanocobalamin) 1.2 mcg; Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) 6.30 mg; Vitamin E (d-alpha-tocopherol from d-alpha-tocopheryl acid succinate) 8.94 Ili; Copper (from copper gluconate) 212.50 mcg; Biotin 1.30 mg; Iron (from iron amino acid chelate) 2.25 mg; Iodine (from potassium iodide) 50 mcg; Manganese (from manganese amino acid chelate) 1.3 mg; Selenium (from selenomethionine) 27.50 mcg; Silica (as colloidal anhydrous silica) 107.07 mg; Zinc (from zinc amino acid chelate) 7.5 mg.

Contains: Phenylalanine, soya beans & sulfites.

Directions

Two tablets daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional. The recommended daily amount of vitamin A from all sources is 700 mcg/RE for women and 900 mcg/RE for men.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
